install.packages('tibble')
install.packages('gapminder')
install.packages('DT')

```{r load, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}

library(tibble)
library(gapminder)
library(DT)
```


## Print out gapminder data:
```{r}
gapminder
```


Convert mtcars to a tibble, and wrap in datatable:

```{r}
datatable(as_tibble(mtcars))
```
